backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing user access control, profiles, and single candidate records with pipeline stages and idempotent user-access initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature requests, affected files, components, and confidence indicators.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, bootstrap gating, role‑intent routing, and switching between candidate and recruiter views.
frontend/src/components/AdminPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the admin page component.
frontend/src/components/ApiDocsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the API documentation page component.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedLoa: Loading UI shown during authenticated bootstrap with skeleton placeholders.
frontend/src/components/BackendInfoBar.t: Displays backend canister ID and API base URL with copy‑to‑clipboard buttons.
frontend/src/components/CandidatesPage.t: Candidate self-service page handling authentication, profile setup, and CRUD actions on the user's own candidate application.
frontend/src/components/InitializationEr: Displays initialization errors with retry, copyable technical details, and expandable debug info.
frontend/src/components/RecruiterPage.ts: Recruiter/admin view with authentication, role checks, and UI for managing all candidates and pipeline stages.
frontend/src/components/RoleSelectionCar: Landing card allowing users to choose candidate or recruiter role intent before login.
frontend/src/components/SchemaDiagramPag: Empty or placeholder component for displaying a schema diagram.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppBootstrap.ts: Central bootstrap logic determining authenticated state, actor readiness, role availability, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCandidates.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating candidate data, including CRUD operations and pipeline stage updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureBaselineUser: Provides a mutation hook that calls actor.ensureUserAccess and tracks attempt state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context/provider with login, logout, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoleIntent.ts: Stores and retrieves a user's role intent in sessionStorage with setter and clear helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current identity and optionally initializes admin access from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserAccess.ts: Exposes queries for caller role and admin status using the safe actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides queries and mutations for fetching and saving the caller's user profile.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/backendUrl.ts: Builds backend canister URLs for local and production environments.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, containers, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines current project state for fixing bootstrap initialization errors and improving diagnostics, listing existing issues and three related feature requirements.
